body:
Pictures: 

http://imgur.com/a/idetl

Download Links:

32x Weapons: https://www.mediafire.com/?zl03n6zmq87y04z

16x Weapons: https://www.mediafire.com/?4h2aa2ujmcpcrsm

I know some people won't like the 32x sword and bow being different from the pack but I find that with higher res swords my pvp seems a lot better, and same for the bow, so I've included a version with Preto 16x Swords and Plast Bow. Here's a comparison picture:




Most of the textures are not created by me and I do not take any credit for them whatsoever. Started off with Plast Pack and also drew a lot of textures from Cryptic Pack. Creds to:

Plast Pack, Preto Pack, Ozian Pack, Hotdog Craft, Maxinoxo, Kaki Pack, Sorlite's Pack, Bibitor, 0FPS Pack, Nikinok's pack, Black and White Pack. I may have forgot some.

There's a changelog in the pack. 
Please comment if you have any feedback!

title: Jongh Pack v2 - 16x

replies.body: It's a solid pack, but there isn't really anything original in it by the looks of it.
replies.body_tagged: It's a solid pack, but there isn't really anything original in it by the looks of it.

replies.body: Awesome I'll try it out for sure!
